Name: PARID
Description: PARID uniquely identifies each assessment record

Name: CBNMKTLAND
Description: Change By Notice Market Assessed Land Value

Name: CBNMKTTOT
Description: Change By Notice Market Assessed Total Value

Name: CBNACTLAND
Description: Change By Notice Actual Assessed Land Value

Name: CBNACTTOT
Description: Change By Notice Actual Assessed Total Value

Name: CBNACTEXTOT
Description: Change By Notice Actual Exemption Total Value

Name: CBNTRNTLAND
Description: Change By Notice Transitional Assessed Land Value

Name: CBNTRNTOT
Description: Change By Notice Transitional Assessed Total Value

Name: CBNTRNEXTOT
Description: Change By Notice Transitional Exemption Total Value

Name: CBNTXBTOT
Description: Change By Notice Taxable Assessed Total Value

Name: CBNTXBEXTOT
Description: Change By Notice Taxable Exemption Total Value

Name: NEWDROP
Description: Indicates that the lot will be dropped at the end of the fiscal year

Name: VALREF
Description: The parcel's values are reflected in another lot

Name: ZONING
Description: Zoning code from NYC Department of City Planning

Name: HOUSENUM_LO
Description: The lowest house number of the property

Name: HOUSENUM_HI
Description: The highest house number of the property

Name: ZIP_CODE
Description: Postal Zip code for the property

Name: GEOSUPPORT_RC
Description: Status of the address data verification from Geosupport

Name: BLD_STORY
Description: The number of stories/floors for the building

Name: CORNER
Description: The code to indicate a corner lot on two streets

Name: NUM_BLDG
Description: The Number of Buildings on the property

Name: YRBUILT
Description: The year the building was constructed

Name: YRBUILT_RANGE
Description: The last year of the range

Name: YRALT2_RANGE
Description: Last year of the second alteration

Name: REUC_REF
Description: Contains the ident number (alpha/numeric) for REUC properties

Name: APPT_DATE
Description: Date of the most recent apportionment

Name: UAF_LAND
Description: Land percent of common interest in the entire condo

Name: UAF_BLDG
Description: Building percent of common interest in the condo

Name: PROTEST_2
Description: Indicates a second protest on the property

Name: PROTEST_OLD
Description: Same codes as the protest indicator

Name: GROSS_SQFT
Description: Gross Square Footage of the building
